main.name: Nathan Patrick
main.bio: Music and tech have been my two passions for the past decade. I’ve recently graduated from Lighthouse Labs web development boot camp, a 3 month full time deep dive into wed dev. It was the most engaging educational endeavour I have ever taken part in and I cant wait to dig into new experiments with app development. Besides tech, I play in touring rock bands and have taken part in battle bots. Keep curious and thanks for your consideration.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.title: AV Tech
work.description: Set up and tech support for large concerts and convention centres... pandemic halted that one real quick.

work.title: Driver
work.description: Delivering high end furniture for clients across Ontario and Quebec.

projects.title: Black Jack Switch
projects.category: A variant on the well known Black Jack build with React. My final project for Lighthouse labs.

projects.title: Jungle
projects.category: Amazons ugly brother, built with Ruby on Rails as a school project.

projects.title: Go-Ol to-do list
projects.category: Just a little to do list app.

testimonials.text: One man’s garbage is another man person’s good un-garbage.
There’s plenty of other interesting things you can do. Have you ever tried marijuana? Maybe it’s time.

lisa Simpson - Springfield know it all
